hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer specialized in Angular & Spring Boot
hero.subtitle2: Building scalable microservices and real-time dashboards

about.description: I'm a Full-Stack Developer specialized in Angular and Spring Boot with expertise in designing modular microservice architectures. Experienced in building interactive dashboards, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and developing Flutter mobile applications. I'm passionate about innovative projects and real-time data visualization. Quick learner and collaborative team player who creates efficient, scalable, and user-friendly solutions that solve real-world problems. Let's work together to bring your ideas to life!

arsela.title: Full-Stack Developer
points: Developing and maintaining scalable full-stack Angular & Spring Boot applications used in real-time energy management.
Building modern interactive dashboards using Ng-Zorro & ECharts for consumption analytics and KPI tracking.
Designing modular microservice architectures with clean domain separation and reusable components.
Implementing automated CI/CD pipelines using GitLab and Docker to streamline deployment and improve reliability.
Collaborating in Agile teams and participating in code reviews, sprint planning, and architectural discussions.

qcmed.title: Full-Stack Developer (Part-Time)
points: Developed a full e-learning quiz platform for medical students preparing for residency exams.
Created a Flutter mobile app with intuitive UX, quiz sessions, correction mode, and progress tracking.
Implemented the web dashboard in Angular with real-time statistics, categories, and question filters.
Designed and optimized the MongoDB schema for fast question retrieval and scalable data storage.
Integrated Angular, Flutter, and NestJS through well-structured REST APIs to ensure a unified experience.

sbi.title: Full-Stack Developer
points: Developed full-stack enterprise applications using Angular, Spring Boot, and modular microservice design.
Built real-time dashboards for smart-meter management and consumption visualization.
Automated CI/CD workflows using GitLab and Docker to improve deployment efficiency.
Implemented a cross-platform Flutter mobile app for energy monitoring and push notifications.
Participated in Agile ceremonies and improved team velocity through documentation and code reviews.

veo.title: Frontend Developer
points: Developed features for the internal carpooling platform NozCovoiturage using React.js.
Integrated REST APIs built in Symfony while ensuring consistent UI/UX across modules.
Improved application performance and reduced load times with optimized components.
Contributed to GitLab CI/CD configurations for automated builds and quality checks.

features: Interactive hero powered by React Three Fiber
Responsive layout styled with Tailwind CSS
